title: Successful email registration shows 'Provjerite email' success screen
description: Verifies a new doctor can register with all required fields and GDPR consent, and the UI shows the email-check success message.

steps.description: Type "Dr Test Doktor" into the full name input
Type "Test Klinika" into the clinic name input
Type "ValidPassw0rd!" into the confirm password input

title: Password confirmation mismatch shows inline error
description: Verifies registration is blocked and an inline mismatch error appears when confirm password does not match.

steps.description: Type "Dr Mismatch" into the full name input
Type "DifferentPassw0rd!" into the confirm password input
Verify text "Password confirmation does not match" is visible

title: GDPR consent unchecked blocks registration with required-consent error
description: Verifies GDPR consent is required and registration is blocked when the checkbox is not checked.

steps.description: Type "Dr No Consent" into the full name input
Type "Klinika Bez Saglasnosti" into the clinic name input
Type "ValidPassw0rd!" into the confirm password input

title: Required-field validation when submitting empty form
description: Verifies the registration form prevents submission and displays validation cues when required fields are missing.

title: Invalid email format is rejected
description: Verifies the UI blocks registration when the email format is invalid.

steps.description: Type "Dr Invalid Email" into the full name input
Type "ValidPassw0rd!" into the confirm password input

title: Weak/short password is rejected
description: Verifies registration is blocked and an error is shown when the password does not meet minimum requirements.

steps.description: Type "Dr Weak Password" into the full name input
Type "123" into the confirm password input

title: Registration page renders key fields and the submit button
description: Verifies the registration UI loads and displays the primary inputs and action controls needed to register.

title: Successful email/password login redirects to dashboard
description: Verifies that a returning user can log in with valid credentials and is redirected to the dashboard.

title: Invalid password shows an error message
description: Verifies that logging in with a correct email and wrong password shows a visible invalid-credentials error and does not redirect to dashboard.

title: Non-existent user shows an error message
description: Verifies that attempting to log in with an email not registered in the system shows a visible error message.

title: Email field validation blocks login when empty
description: Verifies the user cannot submit the login form when the email field is empty.

title: Password field validation blocks login when empty
description: Verifies the user cannot submit the login form when the password field is empty.

title: Invalid email format shows validation feedback
description: Verifies that an incorrectly formatted email address is rejected with visible validation feedback or an error message.

title: Pressing Enter in password field submits login and redirects on success
description: Verifies that pressing Enter from the password field submits the form and logs in successfully with valid credentials.

title: Login page shows key UI elements
description: Verifies that the login page renders essential controls needed to complete email/password login.

title: Complete onboarding wizard using required fields and skip optional clinic step
description: Verifies a new user can complete the full onboarding wizard and lands on the dashboard afterward.

steps.description: Type "Dr. Test Doktor" into the doctor name field
Type "Opšti pregled" into the report category name field

title: Step 1 validation: doctor name required prevents advancing
description: Verifies validation blocks moving past Step 1 when the mandatory doctor name is empty.

title: Step 1 validation: specialization required prevents advancing
description: Verifies validation blocks moving past Step 1 when the mandatory specialization is empty.

steps.description: Type "Dr. Test Spec" into the doctor name field

title: Step 2 optional clinic info: fill fields and proceed with Next
description: Verifies clinic info can be entered on Step 2 and the wizard proceeds to Step 3.

steps.description: Type "Dr. Test Klinika" into the doctor name field
Type "Poliklinika Test" into the clinic name field
Type "Test ulica 1" into the clinic address field
Type "+38761111222" into the clinic phone field
Type "https://example-clinic.test" into the clinic website field

title: Step 3 validation: cannot proceed without at least one report category
description: Verifies Step 3 requires at least one report category before advancing to Step 4.

steps.description: Type "Dr. Test Kategorije" into the doctor name field
Verify text "Dodajte barem jednu kategoriju" is visible

title: Back button navigates to previous steps and preserves entered doctor info
description: Verifies Back navigation works and previously entered Step 1 values remain visible.

steps.description: Type "Dr. Test Back" into the doctor name field
Verify text "Dr. Test Back" is visible

title: Skip Step 2 does not block completion and Step 4 can be finished without uploads
description: Verifies optional steps (clinic and branding) can be skipped/left empty and onboarding still completes.

steps.description: Type "Dr. Test Skip" into the doctor name field
Type "Kontrola" into the report category name field

title: Request password reset with a registered email shows confirmation message
description: Verifies the reset-password page accepts a valid email submission and shows a non-sensitive confirmation state.

title: Request password reset with an unregistered email does not leak account existence
description: Verifies the UI response is non-specific or appropriately generic when the email is not registered.

steps.description: Verify text "No account" is not visible

title: Reset password form validation blocks empty email submission
description: Verifies the user cannot submit the reset form without providing an email.

title: Reset password form validation blocks invalid email format
description: Verifies the UI rejects an incorrectly formatted email address.

title: User can navigate from reset-password to login page
description: Verifies the reset-password page provides a working navigation path back to login.

title: User can navigate from reset-password to registration page
description: Verifies the reset-password page provides a working navigation path to create a new account.

title: Dashboard loads and shows report statistics for an authenticated user
description: Verifies that an authenticated user can reach the dashboard and see report statistics widgets/values rendered.

title: Open a recent report from Dashboard
description: Verifies that clicking a recent report item navigates to an in-app report detail/editor view.

steps.description: Click on the first item in the "Recent reports" list

title: Dashboard quick action: start a new report
description: Verifies that the Dashboard "New report" quick action navigates to the new medical report page.

steps.description: Click on the "New report" quick action button

title: Dashboard quick action: go to Patients
description: Verifies that the Dashboard "Patients" quick action navigates to the patient management page.

steps.description: Click on the "Patients" quick action button

title: Dashboard quick action: go to Settings
description: Verifies that the Dashboard "Settings" quick action navigates to the settings page.

steps.description: Click on the "Settings" quick action button

title: Dashboard shows empty-state when there are no recent reports
description: Verifies that the Dashboard shows a clear empty-state message if the user has no recent reports to display.

steps.description: Verify text "No recent reports" is visible

title: Template mode: select a template and verify template mode indicator is shown
description: Verifies the template workflow UI allows selecting a template and indicates template mode before dictation processing.
category: New Medical Report (Dictation) - New / Update / Template Modes

steps.description: Click "Novi nalaz" in the main navigation
Select "Default template" from the template dropdown

title: Report History loads and displays a list of past reports
description: Verifies that the authenticated user can open Report History and see the reports list UI.

steps.description: Click on "Historija" in the main navigation

title: Search filters reports by patient name or report content and opens details
description: Verifies search narrows the list and a report can be opened from filtered results.

steps.description: Click on "Historija" in the main navigation

title: Search with no matching results shows 'No results found' empty state
description: Verifies the UI displays a clear empty state when search matches no reports.

steps.description: Click on "Historija" in the main navigation
Verify text "No results found" is visible

title: Filtering controls are available and applying a filter updates visible results area
description: Verifies filter UI exists and applying a filter changes the visible list state.

steps.description: Click on "Historija" in the main navigation

title: Open a report from the list and view details page/section
description: Verifies selecting a report from history opens a detail view with report content visible.

steps.description: Click on "Historija" in the main navigation
Click on the first report in the list

title: Search input accepts special characters without breaking the page
description: Verifies the history page remains usable when the user enters punctuation or symbols in search.

steps.description: Click on "Historija" in the main navigation

title: Long search term is handled gracefully and shows a stable results state
description: Verifies the UI remains stable when entering a very long search query.

steps.description: Click on "Historija" in the main navigation

title: Add a new patient and verify it appears in the patient list
description: Verifies a logged-in user can create a patient record and see it listed afterward.

steps.description: Click on "Pacijenti" in the main navigation

title: Create patient from Patients page using valid details
description: Verifies the full add-patient workflow from the Patients page with valid input.

steps.description: Click on "Pacijenti" in the main navigation
Type "Test Patient A" into the Name field
Type "1980-05-20" into the Date of birth field
Verify text "Test Patient A" is visible

title: Prevent saving when required patient name is missing
description: Verifies inline validation blocks saving if a required field is missing.

steps.description: Click on "Pacijenti" in the main navigation
Type "1990-01-01" into the Date of birth field

title: Prevent saving when date of birth is invalid
description: Verifies inline validation appears and saving is blocked for an invalid date of birth.

steps.description: Click on "Pacijenti" in the main navigation
Type "Test Patient Invalid DOB" into the Name field
Type "not-a-date" into the Date of birth field
Verify text "Date of birth" is visible

title: Open Patients page and verify list loads and is usable
description: Verifies the Patients page renders a visible patient list area and primary actions are available.

steps.description: Click on "Pacijenti" in the main navigation
Verify element "Add new patient" is visible

title: Cancel adding a patient does not create a new list entry
description: Verifies exiting the add-patient form without saving does not add a patient to the list.

steps.description: Click on "Pacijenti" in the main navigation
Type "Temp Patient Not Saved" into the Name field
Verify text "Temp Patient Not Saved" is not visible

title: Update doctor profile (name and specialization) successfully
description: Verifies a logged-in user can update doctor name and specialization and sees a visible success confirmation.
category: Settings (Doctor, Clinic, Report Categories, Branding, Account)

steps.description: Click on "Postavke" (Settings) in the main navigation
Type "Dr. Test User" into the doctor name field

title: Save doctor profile changes and see confirmation
description: Verifies saving doctor profile changes shows a visible confirmation and the edited values remain visible after save.
category: Settings (Doctor, Clinic, Report Categories, Branding, Account)

steps.description: Click on "Postavke" (Settings) in the main navigation
Type "Dr. Settings Save" into the doctor name field

title: Edit clinic details successfully
description: Verifies a logged-in user can edit clinic information and see a visible success confirmation.
category: Settings (Doctor, Clinic, Report Categories, Branding, Account)

steps.description: Click on "Postavke" (Settings) in the main navigation
Type "AIMED Test Clinic" into the clinic name field

title: Add a report category and save
description: Verifies a logged-in user can add a new report category and sees a confirmation after saving.
category: Settings (Doctor, Clinic, Report Categories, Branding, Account)

steps.description: Click on "Postavke" (Settings) in the main navigation
Type "Test Category A" into the new category name field

title: Remove a report category and save
description: Verifies a logged-in user can remove an existing report category and sees a confirmation after saving.
category: Settings (Doctor, Clinic, Report Categories, Branding, Account)

steps.description: Click on "Postavke" (Settings) in the main navigation
Click on the "Remove" (delete) control for the first report category in the list

title: Reorder report categories and verify reflected in New Report
description: Verifies a logged-in user can reorder report categories, save, and then see the updated ordering available when starting a new report.
category: Settings (Doctor, Clinic, Report Categories, Branding, Account)

steps.description: Click on "Postavke" (Settings) in the main navigation
Click on the "Move up" control for the second report category

title: Verify settings save confirmation is visible after categories update
description: Verifies that after saving category changes, a visible confirmation message appears on the Settings page.
category: Settings (Doctor, Clinic, Report Categories, Branding, Account)

steps.description: Click on "Postavke" (Settings) in the main navigation

title: Delete account flow - cancel in confirmation modal
description: Verifies that canceling the delete-account confirmation keeps the user on Settings and the account remains intact in the current session.
category: Settings (Doctor, Clinic, Report Categories, Branding, Account)

steps.description: Click on "Postavke" (Settings) in the main navigation

title: Export a finalized report as PDF from History
description: Verifies a user can open a finalized report from history and initiate PDF export from the report view.

steps.description: Click on "Historija" in the main navigation
Click on a finalized report in the history list to open it

title: Start PDF export from a finalized report opened from New Report page
description: Verifies a user can access an existing finalized report context from the New Report area and start PDF export.

steps.description: Click on "Novi nalaz" in the main navigation
Click on a visible option to open an existing finalized report (for example, "Recent reports" or "Open report")

title: Export a finalized report as Word when a template is available
description: Verifies Word export action is available and can be initiated for a finalized report that has a stored .docx template.

steps.description: Click on "Historija" in the main navigation
Click on a finalized report that indicates a Word template is available (for example, shows "Template" or "DOCX" label)

title: Copy report text for HIS and see 'Copied!' feedback
description: Verifies the HIS copy action shows visible success feedback after clicking copy.

steps.description: Click on "Historija" in the main navigation
Click on a finalized report in the history list to open it

title: HIS copy output does not show internal [NAPOMENA] warning text on-screen
description: Verifies the report view does not surface internal [NAPOMENA] warnings in the HIS copy output preview area (if present) after copying.

steps.description: Click on "Historija" in the main navigation
Click on a finalized report that visibly contains a note/warning section in its content (if available)

title: Word export option is not shown when no template is available
description: Verifies that Word export is unavailable (hidden or disabled) for reports without a stored .docx template.

steps.description: Click on "Historija" in the main navigation
Click on a finalized report that does not indicate any Word template is available
Verify element "Export as Word" is not visible

title: Authenticated user is redirected away from /login to /dashboard
description: Verifies middleware prevents logged-in users from accessing the login page and redirects them to the dashboard.

title: Authenticated user can access a protected route after login (no redirect to /login)
description: Verifies that after successful login, navigating to a protected page stays within authenticated area.

title: Accept GDPR consent on first-time app load unlocks app usage
description: Verifies the GDPR consent modal blocks usage until the user accepts, after which the user can proceed to authenticated app areas.

title: GDPR consent modal allows reading consent details before accepting
description: Verifies the user can open and read consent details from the consent modal, then accept to proceed.

steps.description: Click the "Detalji" (Details) link in the GDPR consent modal

title: Declining GDPR consent keeps app blocked from proceeding
description: Verifies that declining consent does not dismiss the blocking state and the user cannot proceed to use the app without accepting.

title: Closing GDPR consent modal (without acceptance) keeps the app blocked
description: Verifies that attempting to close the consent modal without accepting does not unlock the app.

steps.description: Click the close "X" button on the GDPR consent modal

title: One-click data deletion from Settings clears data and returns to consent onboarding state
description: Verifies the user can delete all local data from Settings and is returned to an initial consent-required state afterward.

title: Confirming data deletion clears consent and shows GDPR modal again
description: Verifies that confirming deletion completes the action and the GDPR consent modal reappears, indicating consent state was cleared.

steps.description: Click the "Potvrdi" (Confirm) button in the deletion modal

title: Canceling data deletion leaves current state unchanged
description: Verifies that canceling the deletion confirmation does not delete data or clear consent state.

steps.description: Click the "Otkaži" (Cancel) button in the deletion modal

title: After accepting GDPR consent, navigating within the app does not show the consent modal again in-session
description: Verifies that once consent is accepted, the user can navigate to another authenticated page without being re-blocked by the consent modal during the same session.
